name: emergency room
description:
There are too many patients who need to be rescued. You need to arrange the patients to make them recover.

The patient's hp is decreasing

If you move the patient to the hospital bed, the patient will get treatment

If you move the patient to a suitable bed, the patient will get a faster treatment

The patient's health is 0 and the game is over.

W S A D-----move

J---------Pick up/ Put down the patient（You can put down the patient anywhere）
